title: Die Schlangenf√§ngerin - Gefahr Down Under
overview: Julia's job is both passion and danger: she is a professional snake catcher in Brisbane, Australia. A place with one of the highest snake populations in the world.Many of the species that live there are dangerous, poisonous and some of them are even deadly. No place is safe anymore, the snakes are everywhere. Julia finds the dangerous animals in kindergartens, bedrooms, toilets and air conditioning systems. And the snake season has just begun.The Australian's everyday life is full of action, excitement and driven by her customers who find themselves in tricky situations. As a professional snake catcher, only she is able to master this dangerous job. Julia's goal is to ensure that no one gets hurt or even bitten by one of the deadliest snakes in the world: the Eastern brown snake. Because there are plenty of them in Julia's area of operation.
